content:
**gauges** with f hook and worsted-weight 9 single_crochet = 2 9 single_crochet row = 2 with h hook and worsted-weight 7 half_double_crochet = 2 5 half_double_crochet row = 2 **materials ** - worsted-weight yarn - 3 5oz med green
- 2 5oz peach
- 1oz black
- small amount each brown and dk green
- size 3 pearl cotton small amount dk green - polyester fiberfill - tapestry needle - no 2 steel f and h crochet hooks or sizes needed to obtain gauges free-crochet link 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/seasonal_crochet/fall_crochet_patterns/pumpkin_patch_pillow/
